content.question: Based on the data shown in the graph, which of the following best describes how ecologists could determine when this ecosystem is approaching a climax community?

choices.label: Determine if the keystone species in the ecosystem is present two years after the volcanic eruption
Measure the biomass of the pioneer species present before and after the volcanic eruption
Record the number and type of producers present every year after the eruption
Calculate the net primary productivity of a specific indicator species every year after the eruption

content.answer: Record the number and type of producers present every year after the eruption

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
